Projects

The Cloud Resume Challenge (this !)

This website was built to familiarise myself new tech, AWS and DevOps. There's been a lot to learn, actually. I'd say I've spent 2 months working on this project, although, only the tailend 2 weeks had considerable hours. Now that it's here I'll continuously develop (and continuously integrate) new things. I'm sure at some point there will be the whole #! (hehe).

Engraved Keycap Website

This project was actually my first 'real project' as apart of my A level computer science course. The idea was to create a website for a client whereby users could upload an image, select which keycap profile to use, click continue; and then my website would spit back out a 3D printable file of the image embossed onto the keycap.
Due to some seriously old libraries and fiddly dependencies, this project is no longer in existence - although, I did write the full SDLC doccumentation so maybe one day it will be reborn in frankenstein's monster's form, dismantled and containerised

Stack
  • Bootstrap
  • Django
  • Python
